name: @flyer-ui/commonality
description: 项目开发中通用到的工具类

scripts.dev: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.publish:pre: npm run lint && git checkout master && git merge dev -m 'chore: Merge branch ”dev“' && npm run clean && npm run test && npm run build:prod
scripts.publish:post: git push --follow-tags && npm publish && git branch -D dev && git checkout -b dev
scripts.publish:patch: npm run publish:pre && npm version patch -m 'chore: Upgrade to %s for reasons' && node publish-pre.js && npm run publish:post
scripts.publish:major: npm run publish:pre && npm version major -m 'chore: Upgrade to %s for reasons' && node publish-pre.js && npm run publish:post
scripts.publish:minor: npm run publish:pre && npm version minor -m 'chore: Upgrade to %s for reasons' && node publish-pre.js && npm run publish:post

author: pfzhengd
